problems.title: Remove Duplicate Elements (Maintain Order)
problems.description:
Problem Statement
Given an array of N integers, remove all duplicate elements while maintaining the relative order of the first occurrence of each element.

Input Format
First line contains integer N.
Second line contains N space-separated integers.

Output Format
Print the array after removing duplicates, elements separated by space.

Example 1
Input:
8
4 2 4 1 2 3 3 4

Output:
4 2 1 3

Example 2
Input:
6
5 5 5 5 5 5

Output:
5
hintsList: Use a Set to track seen elements + a list/vector to maintain order
In Python: use dict.fromkeys(arr) or list(dict.fromkeys(arr))
